snippet: A Yemeni security official said the men had been detained by the rebels and were flown out of Sana.
abstract: Omani Foreign Ministry reports that plane from Sana, Yemen’s rebel-held capital, arrived in Oman with three Americans onboard; Yemen security officials say men had been detained by  Houthi insurgents on suspicion of spying.
lead_paragraph: A Yemeni security official said the men had been detained by the rebels and were flown out of Sana.

headline.main: Yemen: 3 Detained Americans Are Allowed to Leave
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Yemen: 3 Detained Americans Are Allowed to Leave
